long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supercharge Your Job Search with LinkedIn Jobs Scraper

Make your job search faster and more efficient with LinkedIn Jobs Scraper! This tool is designed to streamline the process by allowing you to extract job listings directly from LinkedIn, whether from search results or your saved jobs on the “My Jobs” page. Say goodbye to endless scrolling and manual tracking—this extension automates it all.

Key Features
• Extract up to 3,000 job postings that match your search criteria
• Capture job data from both search results and your “My Jobs” saved listings
• Export data in CSV, JSON, or XLSX (Excel) formats for flexible sorting and filtering
• Analyze job market trends to enhance your job applications with targeted insights

How It Works
1. Set Up Your Search
Define job title, location, keywords, and filters for a precise search. The tool will use these criteria to fetch relevant listings.
2. Capture Job Data
After initiating a search, click the “Download Jobs” button to start scraping. The tool automatically collects details like job title, company, location, and description as it scrolls through search results or your “My Jobs” page.
Here’s the revised section:
3. Export to Multiple Formats
Once data is collected, click “Export Jobs” to save it in your chosen format. This structured data is ready for easy sorting, filtering, and analysis.

To select your preferred export format—CSV, JSON, or XLSX—click the gear icon on the main interface to open the Settings page.

Maximize your job search potential with LinkedIn Jobs Scraper, and focus on crafting applications tailored to your skills and career goals!

Data Privacy
Your data stays on your device and is not stored or transmitted to our servers. We prioritize keeping your information secure and confidential.

Disclaimer
LinkedIn™ is registered trademarks or trademarks of LinkedIn Corporation and its affiliates in the United States and other countries. ExtensionBox developed this independent project and has no relationship with LinkedIn Corporation.
